settings.html: Discover the magic of meticulous mammography imaging with the Barco Coronis MDCG-5221, your next leap forward in diagnostic excellence. This 5MP greyscale powerhouse, custom-engineered for breast imaging radiologists, is your perfect partner for viewing both 2D digital mammography and 3D breast tomosynthesis images. Looking for an upgrade? The MDCG-5221 is not just any display; it's a robust, state-of-the-art tool that'll have radiologists swooning over crystal clear images. With its exceptional image resolution and impressive display performance, it's sure to turn heads (and elevate diagnoses!). Imagine not having to squint or adjust your screen repeatedly. With the MDCG-5221, you'll step into a world of enhanced visual precision, where every detail is revealed in stunning clarity. Make no mistake; this is the top-tier tech your practice needs to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving world of radiology.

settings.title: Automatic DICOM Calibration & QA with Barco I-Guard Technology
settings.content: The Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 display leverages I-Guard technology, employing an integrated photometer for consistent image quality assessment and precise DICOM calibration. Integrated seamlessly with Barco's MediCal QAWeb service, I-Guard offers a comprehensive solution for quality assurance and streamlined calibration management. By meeting the unique needs of radiology, I-Guard becomes a key tool for healthcare professionals, bolstering diagnostic dependability and enhancing patient care quality.

settings.title: Uniform Luminance Technology
settings.content: The MDCG-5221, utilizing Barco's Uniform Luminance Technology (ULT), is designed to address challenges faced by radiologists. Traditional LCD displays can exhibit over 25% of screen area with uneven brightness, impairing image quality. ULT technology, however, mitigates such luminance and color inconsistencies, ensuring complete conformity with DICOM GSDF standards across the entire screen surface, thereby enhancing image accuracy and diagnostic reliability.

settings.title: 3D Tomosynthesis
settings.content: The Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 boasts advanced 3D tomosynthesis capabilities, delivering a more thorough and precise visualization of breast tissue. This cutting-edge technology enables radiologists to review a series of high-resolution images from different angles, creating a 3D reconstruction of the breast. Unlike traditional 2D mammography, which may sometimes conceal or distort tissue detail due to overlapping layers, 3D tomosynthesis eliminates these issues by dividing the breast into clear, distinct layers. This allows for more accurate detection and diagnosis of abnormalities, including small cancers that could be overlooked with 2D imaging. Paired with the high-resolution 5.8MP display and enhanced image quality of the Barco Coronis MDCG-5221, the 3D tomosynthesis capability provides a superior viewing experience. It equips radiologists with heightened diagnostic confidence, fostering earlier and more precise detection of breast cancer, ultimately promoting improved patient outcomes.

settings.title: MDCG-5221 & MXRT: Peerless Diagnostic Accuracy
settings.content: Elevate your viewing experience by combining the Coronis MDCG-5221 with a Barco MXRT graphics card. This potent duo offers exceptional image quality and performance, ensuring precise and efficient diagnostic capabilities for radiologists. The MXRT-5600, MXRT-6700, MXRT-7600, and MXRT-8700 graphics cards are specifically engineered to augment the abilities of the MDCG-5221, delivering seamless integration and the highest image quality in the medical imaging domain. Experience unmatched clarity and precision in your diagnostic process by opting for the Barco MDCG-5221 and MXRT graphics card package.

settings.title: SmartCursor: Effortless Cursor Movement Across Varied Displays
settings.content: Do you often encounter the annoying issue of cursor trapping at the borders of differently sized displays? Barco's SmartCursor™ is the ideal solution for this problem. This useful feature eliminates cursor sticking at the borders of adjacent displays with varying dimensions, ensuring smooth navigation. To activate SmartCursor™, go to the Barco System Settings and select the SmartCursor™ option. With this feature enabled, enjoy uninterrupted cursor movement across all your radiology workstation displays, enhancing workflow and minimizing disruptions during critical diagnostic tasks.

settings.title: Enhanced Clarity for Radiologists with Anti-Reflective Glass
settings.content: The Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 display features an anti-reflective coated protective glass, significantly enhancing radiologists' visual clarity and performance. This innovative glass technology curtails glare and reflections, empowering medical professionals to scrutinize images with exceptional sharpness and precision. By reducing visual distractions, the anti-reflective coated protective glass enables radiologists to focus on vital details, promoting more accurate diagnoses and improved patient outcomes. Experience unparalleled image clarity with the Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 and its advanced anti-reflective protective glass.

settings.title: Barco QAWeb Calibration & QA Software
settings.content: Like all Barco medical display systems, the MDCG-5221 is equipped with the convenience of MediCal QAWeb, available as either a standalone local workstation installation or a cloud-based subscription technology. This service provides automated calibration and Quality Assurance, ensuring optimal display uptime without the need for manual intervention. With MediCal QAWeb, reliability and performance are seamlessly maintained, allowing medical professionals to concentrate on their crucial diagnostic tasks.

settings.title: MDCG-5221: Light & Modern Design
settings.content: The Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 medical display monitor masterfully balances size, weight, functionality, and ease of use. Standing at 523mm (20.5 inches) tall, 407mm (16 inches) wide, and 235mm (9.2 inches) deep per monitor, it provides a generous viewing area for radiologists. With a weight of 13.25kg (29.2 lbs) with the stand and 8.25kg (18.1 lbs) without it per monitor, the Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 demonstrates durability and robustness. Suitable for use in hospitals or home offices, the Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 serves as an ideal breast imaging display for radiologists seeking the perfect mix of size, performance, and image quality.

settings.title: Enhanced Radiologist Visibility with Double Brightness on Barco MDCG-5221
settings.content: Experience enhanced detail detection with I-Luminate, a feature that temporarily doubles the brightness of Barco Coronis MDCG-5221 displays to over 1,200 nits for 30 seconds. This brief brightness surge aids radiologists in identifying minute details effortlessly. I-Luminate can be easily activated or deactivated with a single button or keyboard combination, streamlining your diagnostic workflow and ensuring meticulous image analysis.

settings.title: SpotView™
settings.content: The SpotView feature on the MDCG-5221 temporarily enhances display brightness within a defined circular area, aiding in the scrutiny of complex details. It dynamically increases contrast and can magnify or invert pixels within the SpotView region if needed. This functionality provides an optimal viewing experience, making detection of subtle variations more accessible, thus fostering a higher level of diagnostic precision.

settings.title: Ambient Light Compensation (ALC)
settings.content: Barco Coronis MDCG-5221's Ambient Light Compensation (ALC) technology maintains DICOM compliance under all lighting conditions. It gauges display brightness in relation to surrounding light and, in conjunction with MediCal QAWeb, alerts users if ambient light surpasses preset levels. This ensures superior image quality, facilitating detection of vital details in any workspace. Use the ALC feature to enjoy unwavering DICOM compliance and exceptional image quality in diverse environments.

settings.title: DimView
settings.content: DimView intelligently dims secondary displays used for tasks like patient worklists or dictation, reducing peripheral light during readings and allowing your focus to remain on the diagnostic screen. You have the control to select which display(s) should automatically dim when the cursor isn't over them. Each display can be individually dimmed (DimView), or all additional displays can be dimmed in sync (DimView Link), providing a customizable experience tailored to your specific needs.

settings.title: Ergonomic Versatility with MDCG-5221's Adaptable Stand
settings.content: The Barco Coronis MDCG-5221's stand is engineered for optimal usability, offering enhanced comfort and versatility. It supports tilt, swivel, and height adjustments, enabling personalized positioning of the display. Additionally, the stand comes with a connector compartment cover to conceal cables, ensuring a clean and organized workspace. Experience heightened comfort and user-friendly operation with the adaptable stand of the Barco Coronis MDCG-5221.
